welcome_message_body: Welcome to Cagayan de Oro, a city known for its warm hospitality and natural beauty. Explore our charming city, known for its whitewater rafting and delicious local cuisine. Enjoy your stay and make the most of your time here!

restaurants.name: Tadakuma
restaurants.description: Tadakuma is a japanese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Redtail Shrimps & More
restaurants.description: Redtail Shrimps & More is a seafood restaurant located in Lungsod ng Cagayan de Oro.
restaurants.address: Papa Juanito's Square (Limketkai Drive), 9000 Lungsod ng Cagayan de Oro, Misamis Oriental

restaurants.name: Bigby's Cafe & Restaurant
